javadoc: A set of static utilities to facilitate JUnit testing.

methods.name: getTestSuite
methods.comment:
Build JUnit test suite for the specified package.
 TestSuite includes sub-TestSuites for each sub-package.

methods.name: getPkgTestSuite
methods.comment: Build JUnit test suite for the specified package only.

methods.name: getClassNames
methods.comment:
Get all class names within the named package which extend or implement the 
 specified search class.

params.name: searchClass
params.comment: base or interface class to search for.

methods.name: findClassesInPath
methods.comment:
Find and add to classNames, all classes within the classpath and the specified package 
 which extend or implement the specified searchClass.

params.name: classPath
params.comment: directory path that is from CLASSPATH

params.name: searchClass
params.comment: base or interface class to search for.

methods.name: findClassesInJar
methods.comment:
Find and add to classNames, all classes within a jar file and the specified package 
 which extend or implement the specified searchClass.

params.name: searchClass
params.comment: base or interface class to search for.

methods.name: createClassName
methods.comment: Create a java class name from the given filename and class path.

params.name: filename
params.comment: filename that has the class path pre-pended to it.

params.name: fileSep
params.comment: file separator used within filename ('/' or '\').

methods.javadoc:
Return true if c is a derivative of the filter class 
 and is not abstract.
methods.name: isClassOfInterest
methods.comment:
Return true if c is a derivative of the filter class 
 and is not abstract.

methods.javadoc:
Get all potential package names within the named package.
@param pkgName package name
methods.name: getSubPkgNames
methods.comment: Get all potential package names within the named package.

methods.name: findPkgsInPath
methods.comment: Find and add to pkgNames, all packages contained within the specified package

params.name: classPath
params.comment: directory path that is from CLASSPATH

methods.name: findPkgsInJar
methods.comment:
Find and add to pkgNames, all packages contained within the specified package
 which contain an AllTests class.

methods.name: createTestSuites
methods.comment:
Create the Java source file a JUnit TestSuite which 
 includes all TestCases within a package directory.

methods.name: createTestSuites
methods.comment:
Create the Java source file a JUnit TestSuite which 
 includes all TestCases within a package directory.

methods.name: makeDir
methods.comment: Make the directory which corresponds to the specified package.

methods.javadoc:
Command-line utilities.

Parameter usage: 

    createAllTests
@param args
methods.name: main

name: TestSuiteUtilities
comment: A set of static utilities to facilitate JUnit testing.

fields.name: ALL_TESTS_CODE
